channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Animate CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Animate CC

item.title: CVE-2019-7960|2024-08-04T21:02:19.379Z -- adobe -- adobe%20animate%20cc
item.description: Adobe Animate CC versions 19.2.1 and earlier have an insecure library loading (dll hijacking) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.
